newsitem.title: USA: First Commercial sees $0.44/shr gain in Q3.
newsitem.headline: First Commercial sees $0.44/shr gain in Q3.

text.p: First Commercial Corp said Friday it will report a $0.44 non-recurring gain as an extraordinary item in the third quarter, resulting from its $53 million sale of two banks.
The company said it successfully completed the sale of two banks located in Russellville and Searcy to Simmons First National Corp of Pine Bluff, Arkansas.
First Bank of Arkansas, Russellville and First Bank of Arkansas, Searcy, were previously acquired through First Commercial's affiliation with Southwest Bancshares Inc, which closed May 15.
The sale of the two banks, required by regulatory authorities because of market share limitations, was announced in the first quarter.
